org.example

Interface MicroserviceController

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    ServiceController

    public interface MicroserviceController
    Class to declare fundamental core method to implement a service working correctly with Decision Service; Is necessary to add @RestController annotation in the service class created;

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addDataType()
      Before sending any input to Decision Service, is necessary to let him know that data, this function can use static method "registerNewType" from Communication class to add data types inside Decision Service Database.
      void end()
      Sending to Decision Service ending of this service process and communications;
      java.lang.String getGetMapping()
      GET mapping is the final extension of service address where it is listening for a GET http request;
      java.lang.String getPutMapping()
      PUT mapping is the final extension of service address where it is listening for a PUT http request;
      org.json.JSONObject getValues() 
      org.json.JSONObject getWanted() 
      org.json.JSONArray getWorkspaces()
      Necessary to obtain from Decision Service a reference value;
      boolean isSensor() 
      java.lang.String toString() 
      void update()
      Function to put to Decision Service workspace;

    • Method Detail

      • addDataType

        @PostConstruct
void addDataType()
        Before sending any input to Decision Service, is necessary to let him know that data, this function can use static method "registerNewType" from Communication class to add data types inside Decision Service Database. Pay attention about DataName spelling;

      • getGetMapping

        java.lang.String getGetMapping()
        GET mapping is the final extension of service address where it is listening for a GET http request;
        Returns:
        Final extension of service address;

      • getPutMapping

        java.lang.String getPutMapping()
        PUT mapping is the final extension of service address where it is listening for a PUT http request;
        Returns:
        Final extension of service address;

      • getValues

        org.json.JSONObject getValues()
        Returns:
        a JSONObject with a list of data types handled used as keys for Arrays of relative values;

      • getWanted

        org.json.JSONObject getWanted()
        Returns:
        a JSONObject with a list of data types handled used as keys for relative singles values;

      • getWorkspaces

        org.json.JSONArray getWorkspaces()
        Necessary to obtain from Decision Service a reference value;
        Returns:
        a JSONArray with list of data type handled by this actuator;

      • isSensor

        boolean isSensor()
        Returns:
        true if service is a sensor, false if it is an actuator;

      • update

        void update()
        Function to put to Decision Service workspace;

      • toString

        java.lang.String toString()
        Overrides:
        toString in class java.lang.Object

      • end

        @PreDestroy
void end()
        Sending to Decision Service ending of this service process and communications;
